CisMan.label: Cis Man
CisMan.description: A man whose gender aligns with the sex they were assigned at birth.

TransMan.label: Trans Man
TransMan.description: A man who is transgender and whose gender is different from the sex assigned at birth.

CisWoman.label: Cis Woman
CisWoman.description: A woman whose gender aligns with the sex they were assigned at birth.

TransWoman.label: Trans Woman
TransWoman.description: A woman who is transgender and whose gender is different from the sex assigned at birth.

Lesbian.label: Lesbian
Lesbian.description: A woman who is emotionally, romantically, or sexually attracted to other women.

Gay.label: Gay
Gay.description: A person who is emotionally, romantically, or sexually attracted to people of the same gender. Often used specifically to refer to men attracted to men.

Bisexual.label: Bisexual
Bisexual.description: A person who is emotionally, romantically, or sexually attracted to more than one sex or gender.

Transgender.label: Transgender
Transgender.description: An umbrella term for people whose gender identity is different from the sex assigned at birth.

Queer.label: Queer
Queer.description: A term used by some people, particularly younger people, whose sexual orientation is not exclusively heterosexual. Often used by those who reject traditional gender identities.

Intersex.label: Intersex
Intersex.description: A term used to describe a variety of conditions in which a person is born with reproductive or sexual anatomy that doesnâ€™t fit the typical definitions of female or male.

Asexual.label: Asexual
Asexual.description: A person who experiences little or no sexual attraction to others.

Agender.label: Agender
Agender.description: A person who does not identify with any gender.

Androgyne.label: Androgyne
Androgyne.description: A person who identifies with a mix of male and female gender characteristics.

Bigender.label: Bigender
Bigender.description: A person who identifies with two genders.

Genderqueer.label: Genderqueer
Genderqueer.description: A person who does not subscribe exclusively to conventional gender distinctions but identifies with neither, both, or a combination of male and female genders.

Genderfluid.label: Genderfluid
Genderfluid.description: A person whose gender identity changes.

NonBinary.label: Non-binary
NonBinary.description: A person who does not identify as male or female, or who may identify as both male and female, or neither, at different times.

Pangender.label: Pangender
Pangender.description: A person whose identity spans multiple genders.

TwoSpirit.label: Two-Spirit
TwoSpirit.description: A person who identifies with a Native American third gender or gender-variant ceremonial role.

Neutrois.label: Neutrois
Neutrois.description: A non-binary gender identity that is considered to be a neutral or null gender.

GenderApathetic.label: Gender Apathetic
GenderApathetic.description: A person who does not strongly identify with any gender or the concept of gender identities.

Demigirl.label: Demigirl
Demigirl.description: A person who partially identifies as a woman, girl, or feminine, but not wholly.

Demiboy.label: Demiboy
Demiboy.description: A person who partially identifies as a man, boy, or masculine, but not wholly.

Genderflux.label: Genderflux
Genderflux.description: A person whose gender intensity fluctuates and can vary in its presence and magnitude.

Aporagender.label: Aporagender
Aporagender.description: A gender identity outside of the traditional gender binary and not defined in relation to male or female.

Maverique.label: Maverique
Maverique.description: A non-binary gender that exists outside of the orthodox social bounds of gender.

Polygender.label: Polygender
Polygender.description: A person who identifies as multiple genders simultaneously or at different times.

Intergender.label: Intergender
Intergender.description: A person whose gender identity is between genders or a combination of genders.

Graygender.label: Graygender
Graygender.description: A person who identifies with a gender, but not strongly so.
